charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY,  FAILED TO ENSURE THAT THE CHILD SAFETY LOCKS WERE ENGAGED ON THE REAR DOORS OF HIS ASSIGNED DEPARTMENT VEHICLE, RESULTING IN THE ESCAPE OF A DEPARTMENT PRISONER
WHILE OFF-DUTY, WRONGFULLY OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE UNDER THE INFLUENCE OF AN INTOXICANT.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (10 day(s) )

charges.description: WRONGFULLY OPERATED A MOTOR VEHICLE WHILE HIS ABILITY WAS IMPAIRED BY THE CONSUMPTION OF ALCOHOL.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (10 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, REFUSED TO SUBMIT TO A CHEMICAL BREATH TEST.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (10 day(s) )

charges.description: CONSUMED AN INTOXICANT TO THE EXTENT HE WAS UNFIT FOR DUTY.
charges.penalty: COUNSELING, DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), ORDERED BREATH TESTING, PRE-TRIAL SUSPENSION DAYS (30 day(s) ), VACATION DAYS (10 day(s) )

charges.description: DID KNOWINGLY ASSOCIATE WITH PERSONS OR ORGANIZATIONS REASONABLY BELIEVED TO ENGAGED IN, LIKELY TO ENGAGE IN, OR TO HAVE ENGAGED IN CRIMINAL ACTIVITIES.
DID WRONGFULLY AND WITHOUT JUST CAUSE ENGAGE IN OFF-DUTY EMPLOYMENT WITHOUT AUTHORITY OR PERMISSION TO DO SO.
DID WRONGFULLY AND WITHOUT JUST CAUSE UTILIZE DEPARTMENT DATABASES TO MAKE INQUIRIES UNRELATED TO THE OFFICIAL BUSINESS OF THE DEPARTMENT OR THE CITY OF NEW YORK.
DID FAIL AND NEGLECT TO PROVIDE SAID OFFICER's COMMANDING OFFICER WITH AN OPERABLE PERSONAL TELEPHONE NUMBER, AS REQUIRED.

charges.description: WHILE ON DUTY, HE USED A DEPARTMENT BATTERING RAM IN THE EXECUTION OF A PRACTICAL JOKE.
WHILE ON-DUTY,  AS RESULT OF A PRACTICAL JOKE HE CONDUCTED, CAUSED DAMAGE TO A BATHROOM DOOR LOCATED INSIDE OF A DEPARTMENT FACILITY.
USED HIS PERSONAL VIDEO CAMERA TO RECORD THE EXECUTION OF A SEARCH WARRANT AND DID NOT HAVE THE PERMISSION OR AUTHORITY OF THE DEPARTMENT TO DO SO.
FAILED TO DISCLOSE AND PROVIDE A COPY OF VIDEO RECORDINGS HE MADE OF THE EXECUTION OF SEARCH WARRANTS TO THE OFFICE OF THE DISTRICT ATTORNEY.
FRISKED AN INDIVIDUAL WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.

charges.description: SAID DETECTIVE, WAS LATE TO, WAS ABSENT FROM, OR LEFT EARLY FROM HIS ASSIGNMENT, WITHOUT PERMISSION OR POLICE NECESSITY, ON APPROXIMATELY TWENTY-FOUR (24) OCCASIONS
charges.penalty: DEDUCTION OF PENSIONABLE TIME, FORFEITURE OF TIME/LEAVE BALANCES, RESTITUTION ($216), VACATION DAYS (20 day(s) )

charges.description: SAID DETECTIVE, ON APPROXIMATELY THIRTY-FIVE (35) OCCASIONS, WRONGFULLY MADE INACCURATE ENTRIES IN DEPARTMENT RECORDS
charges.penalty: DEDUCTION OF PENSIONABLE TIME, FORFEITURE OF TIME/LEAVE BALANCES, RESTITUTION ($216), VACATION DAYS (20 day(s) )

charges.description: SAID DETECTIVE,  ON APPROXIMATELY FORTY-FIVE (45) DATES, WRONGFULLY MADE INACCURATE ENTRIES IN A SIGN IN/SIGN OUT LOG OR HIS ACTIVITY LOG.
charges.penalty: DEDUCTION OF PENSIONABLE TIME, FORFEITURE OF TIME/LEAVE BALANCES, RESTITUTION ($216), VACATION DAYS (20 day(s) )

charges.description: SAID DETECTIVE, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO PROPERLY SAFEGUARD HIS ACTIVITY LOG.
charges.penalty: DEDUCTION OF PENSIONABLE TIME, FORFEITURE OF TIME/LEAVE BALANCES, RESTITUTION ($216), VACATION DAYS (20 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE ON DUTY, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO PREPARE AND/OR SUBMIT OR ENSURE THE PREPARATION AND/OR SUBMISSION OF AN ACCIDENT REPORT - CITY INVOLVED AND/OR AN AIDED REPORT

WHILE ON-DUTY,  WRONGFULLY FAILED TO FOLLOW THE PROPER DEPARTMENT PROCEDURES AND/OR FAILED TO SUPERVISE PROPERLY POLICE OFFICERS UNDER HIS DIRECT SUPERVISION REGARDING THE HANDLING OF AN ASSIGNMENT INVOLVING AN EMOTIONALLY DISTURBED PERSON AND/OR BARRICADED PERSON
WHILE ON-DUTY, HE ENTERED A LOCATION KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY
WHILE ON-DUTY, FAILED AND NEGLECTED TO PREPARE OR DIRECT THE PREPARATION OF A COMPLAINT REPORT WORKSHEET

WHILE ON-DUTY,  WRONGFULLY FAILED TO SUPERVISE PROPERLY POLICE OFFICERS UNDER HIS DIRECT SUPERVISION REGARDING THE HANDLING AND INVESTIGATION OF AN ASSIGNMENT INVOLVING AN ALLEGED ASSAULT AND A VEHICLE COLLISION
HAVING BECOME AWARE OF AN ALLEGATION OF MISCONDUCT, WRONGFULLY FAILED TO REPORT SAID ALLEGATION TO THE INTERNAL AFFAIRS BUREAU
WHILE ON DUTY,  WRONGFULLY FAILED AND NEGLECTED TO MAKE ACTIVITY LOG ENTRIES

charges.description: WHILE ON-DUTY, WRONGFULLY INTERFERED WITH A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT'S ABILITY TO RECORD AN INCIDENT WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.
WHILE ON-DUTY, ABUSED HIS AUTHORITY AS A MEMBER OF THE NEW YORK CITY POLICE DEPARTMENT, IN THAT HE SEARCHED THE BAG OF A PERSON KNOWN TO THE DEPARTMENT WITHOUT SUFFICIENT LEGAL AUTHORITY.

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY, FAILED TO SAFEGUARD HIS DEPARTMENT FIREARM BY LEAVING IT UNATTENDED IN A PUBLIC BATHROOM AND FAILED TO REPORT SAID LOSS.
WHILE ON-DUTY, FAILED TO ASSIGN A NON-EMERGENCY CALL THAT HE RECEIVED AND FAILED TO ENTER SAID CALL IN THE TELEPHONE DISPATCH LOG, AS REQUIRED.
FAILED TO SAFEGUARD HIS DEPARTMENT RADIO AND FAILED TO REPORT SAID LOSS TO HIS COMMANDING OFFICER OR PREPARE A COMPLAINT REPORT WITH THE INTERNAL AFFAIRS BUREAU.
WHILE OFF-DUTY DEFRAUDED THE UNITED STATES POSTAL SERVICE OF THE LAWFUL PAYMENT OF POSTAGE BY AFFIXING COUNTERFEIT POSTAGE ON ITEMS PLACED INTO THE MAIL STREAM.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (30 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY POSSESSED COUNTERFEIT POSTAGE INDICIA THAT WAS ORIGINALLY GENERATED BY A POSTAGE EVIDENCING SYSTEM LICENSED TO THE NEW YORK CITY ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT CORPORATION.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (30 day(s) )

charges.description: WHILE OFF-DUTY ENGAGED IN OFF-DUTY EMPLOYMENT WITHOUT THE APPROVAL OF THE DEPARTMENT.
charges.penalty: DISMISSAL PROBATION (12 month(s) ), VACATION DAYS (30 day(s) )
